value:
Chrom entrusted me with this—the
blade of an exalt's tactician. It's a
symbol of my position and our bond.

I don't remember a thing from before
I met Chrom, but I have a wealth of
fond memories with my friends now.

It isn't naive to have hope for a world
without conflict. The Order of Heroes
is motivated by exactly that.

Our bonds transcend hardship. Even
if the future is full of despair, their
strength will endure.

I've heard incredible things about the
Greil Mercenaries' tactician, Soren.
I'm glad he's on our side...

Hi there. I hope you can make good
use of these supplies—I brought them
from $Nf's castle.

The future can be changed.
I believe in those words with
all my heart.

Somehow we made it through. Well,
let's not take it for granted—focus
up as we move ahead.

I can't afford to get down on myself.
The battle isn't over. Let's just try
a different tack next time.

Thank you for trusting me with this.
Now it's up to me to prove you made
the right choice.

I'm Robin, tactician to Exalt Chrom—
and I hope I'll actually be as useful to
you as that makes me sound.

The Shepherds' fight to protect
Ylisse started small, but eventually
it engulfed the entire continent.$k$pAnd now I find myself taking part in
an even bigger struggle—one that
involves Heroes from many worlds.$k$pHowever the scale of our battles may
change, there is one thing that will
always remain constant for me.$k$pI will always carry hope for a peaceful
world—the same hope Chrom's eyes
held on the day he and I met.$k$pAs long as that hope is alive, we will
never give up the fight. We will never
surrender to despair.$k$pI promise you this: if you'll share in
that hope with me, then I'll guide you
on a path to a brighter future.
A flawless strategy!
Everyone plays their part!
Victory, now and forever!
An obvious ploy!
I failed them...
This is the outfit of the exalt's—erm, Chrom's—personal tactician. Does it look as impressive as it feels?
*startle* Oh. You were fixing my hair? Uh, thanks.
Nobody goes along with the plans of a tactician they don't trust. Right?
I've come this far thanks to not only my successes, but also my setbacks.
I could have sworn I heard a chorus of voices calling my name...
Someday, I will devise a strategy to free this world from conflict once and for all.
I can't imagine doing any of this without you, and, well...I hope you feel the same.
A worthy plan.
Let me think...
Here we go.
